title: Junior Front-End Web Developer
responsibilities: Launch, maintain, and update a variety of websites
Optimize sites for scale and feasibility
Work with a team of front end developers to create awesome websites
Accurately replicating mock ups into fully fledged websites
Collaborate with content writers and designers
qualifications: 1+ year of experience working with HTML and CSS
1+ year of experience converting design files into HTML and CSS
1+ year of experience working with JavaScript and jQuery
Knowledge of responsive design, some experience implementing within a project or website
Working knowledge of CSS Frameworks, preferably Bootstrap
Working knowledge of CSS Preprocessors (SASS, LESS)
Experience using version control tools like git
benefits: 22 days paid time off (29 days after 3 years. Flexible time off after 5 years!)
4% retirement matching through a Charles Schwab 401(k)
100% employer-paid medical, dental and vision for employees
